title: Valhalla Knight armor
summaries: Valhalla Knight armor is a Hardmode armor set purchased from the Tavernkeep for 2250000*225 [img:Defender Medal] in total, after Golem has been defeated. The set consists of the Valhalla Knight's Helm, Valhalla Knight's Breastplate and Valhalla Knight's Greaves.
A full set of Valhalla Knight armor provides the following benefits:

• +68 / +64 defense
  • +10% melee damage
  • +20% melee critical strike chance
  • +60% minion damage
  • +3 sentry slots
  • +20% / +30% movement speed
  • +4 / +8 HP/second health regeneration

Additionally, wearing the full set will increase the velocity of the Ballista sentries' projectiles, will greatly increase their fire rate, and will increase the maximum number of enemies that can be pierced by them from 3 to 6. It also grants the wearer the Ballista Panic! buff upon taking any damage, which further increases the fire rate of all Ballista sentries summoned by the player for 5 seconds.
The Valhalla Knight armor set is an upgrade of the Squire armor set.
